column2: Question Text
When in his homes, Jason ____ to walk around barefoot.
The bags of chalk ____ on the floor.
On the table ____ pens of various colors.
Back on the horse, the rider wearing tons of colorful flags ____ gleefully.
The fruits over there ____ rotten.
Just as you look out the window, a flock of ducks ____ by in a V formation.
The stars in our galaxy ____ bright at night.
The human on rollerblades ____ gracefully around the park.
The pencils on the desk ____ all dull or broken.
Tapping the tempo with her toe, Amelia ____ perfect time during her performances.
The horses, each fitted with a harness, ____ around the enclosure.
The judge and the scientist ____ on the bench in the park.
One of the actors in both plays ____ struggling with their lines.
Among the many decorations at the party, the balloons ____ floating near the ceiling.
The bouquet of flowers, which my friend picked, ____ bright and colorful.
Sitting in the front row, the children ____ excited about the performance.
Each of the dogs in the park ____ barking loudly at the squirrels.
With a plethora of choices available, the menu ____ overwhelming at first glance.
The travelers, along with their guide, ____ visiting several historical sites this week.
Despite the rain, the crowd of fans ____ cheering for their team.
Across the valley, the herd of deer ____ grazing peacefully in the field.
The box of chocolates, which was a gift, ____ now empty after the party.
Inside the box, a series of intricate puzzles ____ waiting to be solved.
During the lecture at the university, several species of birds ____ discussed in great detail.
With a plethora of books available, the shelves in the library ____ lined with new arrivals.
The tourists, who have traveled the world, ____ sharing their adventure stories.
Despite the suggestions from a few experts, many methods of teaching ____ still debated.
